nodes.text: Tracyn Island was an island on the planet Rishi, located in the Outer Rim Territories of the galaxy. Named for the word tracyn, meaning "fire" in the Mandalorian language of Mando'a, the volcanic Tracyn Island was occupied by a clan of Mandalorians during the Galactic War. Led by Shae Vizla, the Mandalorians moved to the island after they split with the Nova Blades pirates, and they built an island-wide enclave to keep a number of creatures to test themselves against. Shortly before the Battle of Rishi, a group of independent operatives traveled to Tracyn Island and bested the clan's challenges in order to speak with Vizla.

Tracyn Island appears as the main location in "Blood Hunt," a Flashpoint added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic in the 2014 Digital Expansion Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan.
